info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 9:09AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FIRE DANGER STATEMENT IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EDT THIS EVENING... The combination of wind gusts up to 25 mph, minimum relative humidity of 25, and limited rainfall in the last couple of days will lead to an increased risk of adverse fire weather conditions today over portions of southeastern North Carolina. Outdoor burning is strongly discouraged in these areas. Please refer to your local burn permitting authorities on whether you can burn. If you do, you are advised to use extreme caution.
